description: Hot, fresh flavours give new life to salmon.
name: Salmon Jungle Curry Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 400g salmon fillets, pinboned, skinned, cut into chunks

recipeInstructions.text: In a large frying pan, heat the oil, add the curry paste, and stir. Throw in the garlic, ginger, and chillies. Keep stirring for 2-3 minutes.
Now pour in the coconut milk. Bring to a boil, then add the fish sauce, bamboo shoots, pea aubergines (if using), and baby corn. Reduce the heat slightly, and simmer for 5 minutes.
Add the salmon and basil, and simmer for another 5-10 minutes until the fish is cooked. Season and serve with sticky Thai jasmine rice.
